Auth-Token: ***
Authorization: ***
Secret-Request-Header: ***
Super-Secret-Request-Header: ***
Token: ***

X-Api-Secret: ***
X-Auth-Token: ***
X-Authorization: not-redacted
X-Token: ***
Accept-Encoding: gzip

{
	"foo": "request-body-aaaa-aaaa"
}

[HTTP Response]
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Length: 37

{
	"bar": "response-body-aaaa-aaaa"
}
